testcase.name: Validate Login with valid inputs and display successful if expected.
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Sign in link check next page title......................passed When user enters username and password clicks on Submit button..............passed Then validate user and display a Successful message.........................passed Then Logout and close Application...........................................passed

testcase.name: Validate Login with invalid inputs and display error message
testcase.system-out: Given user is on home page..................................................passed When user clicks on Sign in link check next page title......................passed When user enters invalid username and valid password clicks on Submit button.passed Then validate for error message.............................................passed When user enters valid username and invalid password clicks on submit button.passed Then validate for error message.............................................passed

testcase.name: Login Validation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed When User clicks on Sign in Link............................................passed Then User sees Login Page...................................................passed When User enters "jack" and "jack123" clicks on Submit......................passed Then User sees User Account.................................................passed

testcase.name: Login Validation 2
